spi_flash_SST25VF016B.c
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00002  * @file    spi_flash_SST25VF016B.c
00003  * @version $Rev:: 46           $
00004  * @date    $Date:: 2015-11-18 #$
00005  * @brief   This file provides a set of functions needed to manage the
00006  *          communication between SPI peripheral and SPI SST25VF016B FLASH.
00007  *************************************************************************************************************
00008  * @attention
00009  *

00037 /** @addtogroup SPI_FLASH_AUTO SPI_FLASH_AUTO
00038   * @brief The SPI Flash Driver with auto detection function.
00039   * @{
00040   */

00044 /** @defgroup SPI_FLASH_AUTO_Exported_Functions SPI_FLASH_AUTO exported functions
00045   * @{
00046   */
00047 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00048   * @brief  Writes one byte to the FLASH.
00049   * @param  DataByte : the data byte to be written to the FLASH.
00050   * @param  WriteAddr : FLASH's internal address to write to.
00051   * @retval None
00052   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00053 void SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(u8 DataByte, u32 WriteAddr)
00054 {
00055   /* Enable the write access to the FLASH                                                                   */
00056   SPI_FLASH_WriteEnable_0();
00057 
00058   /* Select the SPI FLASH                                                                                   */
00059   SPI_FLASH_SEL_ACTIVE();
00060   /* Send "Program one data byte " instruction                                                              */
00061   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(SST25V016B_CMD_BP);
00062   /* Send high byte address of WriteAddr                                                                    */
00063   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0((WriteAddr & 0xFF0000) >> 16);
00064   /* Send medium byte address of WriteAddr                                                                  */
00065   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0((WriteAddr & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00066   /* Send low byte address of WriteAddr                                                                     */
00067   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(WriteAddr & 0xFF);
00068 
00069   /* Send a byte to the FLASH                                                                               */
00070   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(DataByte);
00071 
00072   /* Deselect the SPI FLASH                                                                                 */
00073   SPI_FLASH_SEL_INACTIVE();
00074 
00075   /* Wait the write operation has completed                                                                 */
00076   SPI_FLASH_WaitForWriteEnd_0();
00077 }
00078 
00079 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00080   * @brief  Writes block of data to the FLASH using Automatic Address Increment Programming.
00081   * @param  WriteBuffer : pointer to the buffer  containing the data to be written to the FLASH.
00082   * @param  WriteAddr : FLASH's internal address to write to.
00083   * @param  NumOfWriteByte : number of bytes to write to the FLASH.
00084   * @retval None
00085   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00086 void SST25VF016B_AAIWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte)
00087 {
00088   u16 temp, NumOfWrite = NumOfWriteByte/2;
00089 
00090   /* Enable the write access to the FLASH                                                                   */
00091   SPI_FLASH_WriteEnable_0();
00092 
00093   /* Select the SPI FLASH                                                                                   */
00094   SPI_FLASH_SEL_ACTIVE();
00095   /* Send "Automatic Address Increment Programming" instruction                                             */
00096   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(SST25V016B_CMD_AAI);
00097   /* Send high byte address of WriteAddr                                                                    */
00098   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0((WriteAddr & 0xFF0000) >> 16);
00099   /* Send medium byte address of WriteAddr                                                                  */
00100   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0((WriteAddr & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00101   /* Send low byte address of WriteAddr                                                                     */
00102   SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(WriteAddr & 0xFF);
00103 
00104   for (temp = 0; temp < 2; temp++)
00105   {
00106     /* Send the current byte                                                                                */
00107     SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(*WriteBuffer);
00108     /* Point on the next byte to be written                                                                 */
00109     WriteBuffer++;
00110   }
00111 
00112   NumOfWrite--;
00113 
00114   /* Deselect the SPI FLASH                                                                                 */
00115   SPI_FLASH_SEL_INACTIVE();
00116 
00117   /* Wait the write operation has completed                                                                 */
00118   SPI_FLASH_WaitForWriteEnd_0();
00119 
00120   if (NumOfWrite)
00121   {
00122     while (NumOfWrite--)
00123     {
00124       /* Select the SPI FLASH                                                                               */
00125       SPI_FLASH_SEL_ACTIVE();
00126       /* Send "Automatic Address Increment Programming" instruction                                         */
00127       SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(SST25V016B_CMD_AAI);
00128 
00129       for (temp = 0; temp < 2; temp++)
00130       {
00131         /* Send the current byte                                                                            */
00132         SPI_FLASH_SendByte_0(*WriteBuffer);
00133         /* Point on the next byte to be written                                                             */
00134         WriteBuffer++;
00135       }
00136 
00137       /* Deselect the SPI FLASH                                                                             */
00138       SPI_FLASH_SEL_INACTIVE();
00139 
00140       /* Wait the end of Flash writing                                                                      */
00141       SPI_FLASH_WaitForWriteEnd_0();
00142 
00143     }
00144   }
00145 
00146   /* Disable the write access to the FLASH                                                                  */
00147   SPI_FLASH_WriteDisable_0();
00148 }
00149 
00150 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00151   * @brief  Writes block of data to the FLASH.
00152   * @param  WriteBuffer : pointer to the buffer  containing the data to be written to the FLASH.
00153   * @param  WriteAddr : FLASH's internal address to write to.
00154   * @param  NumOfWriteByte : number of bytes to write to the FLASH.
00155   * @retval None
00156   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00157 void SST25VF016B_BufferWrite(u8* WriteBuffer, u32 WriteAddr, u32 NumOfWriteByte)
00158 {
00159   u8 NumOfSingle = 0, Addr = 0;
00160   u16 NumOfPage = 0;
00161 
00162   Addr = WriteAddr % 2;
00163   NumOfPage =  NumOfWriteByte / 2;
00164   NumOfSingle = NumOfWriteByte % 2;
00165 
00166   if (Addr == 0)
00167   {
00168     if (NumOfPage == 0) /* Only one byte to be written to                                                   */
00169     {
00170       SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(*WriteBuffer, WriteAddr);
00171     }
00172     else
00173     {
00174       SST25VF016B_AAIWrite(WriteBuffer, WriteAddr, NumOfWriteByte);
00175       WriteAddr +=  NumOfWriteByte;
00176       WriteBuffer += NumOfWriteByte;
00177     }
00178 
00179     if (NumOfSingle)
00180     {
00181       SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(*WriteBuffer, WriteAddr);
00182     }
00183   }
00184   else
00185   {
00186     if (NumOfPage== 0) /* Only one byte to be written to                                                    */
00187     {
00188       SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(*WriteBuffer, WriteAddr);
00189     }
00190     else
00191     {
00192       SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(*WriteBuffer, WriteAddr);
00193       WriteAddr +=  1;
00194       WriteBuffer += 1;
00195 
00196       SST25VF016B_AAIWrite(WriteBuffer, WriteAddr, NumOfWriteByte);
00197       WriteAddr +=  NumOfWriteByte;
00198       WriteBuffer += NumOfWriteByte;
00199 
00200       if (NumOfSingle)
00201       {
00202         SST25VF016B_ByteWrite(*WriteBuffer, WriteAddr);
00203       }
00204      }
00205    }
00206 }
